name: I Am the Inter-Galactic Wizards
description:
I AM THE INTER-GALACTIC WIZARDS was made for the "So bad it's good" game jam in 2017. As such all of its shortcomings and flaws are to be considered intended.

This game is released under the GNU General Public License version 3. The source code is available above and at https://bitbucket.org/ltpour/i-am-the-intergalactic-wizards.

Apology to GNU/Linux users: The game was made with Godot Engine and built with the standard export templates from https://godotengine.org/downlo... which unfortunately produce a binary that depends on PulseAudio. So far my attempts to build working export templates without this anti-feature have been unsuccessful. However the game runs fine from the Godot editor (you need the source code to do this)
